description:
## MEGA for Edge

MEGA web extension app.
	
#### PACKAGE NOTE: This installs no software. It installs a registry key for the extension that Edge will see and then ask you for permission to enable the extension if you are in Edge or on the next run. Edge will install the latest version of the extension. The mentioned version is the version at time of packaging, you can ignore it. Edge will handle updates to the extension.
author: Mega Limited
